Quick Troubleshooting

1) Check the Video Visibility

Only public Facebook videos can be processed. Private or restricted content will not work.

2) Try Another Browser

Use a modern browser (Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari). Disable extensions that may block requests.

3) Verify the Link Format

Paste the full URL from Facebook. Avoid shortened links if possible.

4) Clear Cache & Retry

Temporary cache issues can prevent processing. Clear the cache or try incognito mode.

Response Times & Availability

We aim to respond within 24–48 business hours. During high-volume periods, it may take longer—but we read every message.

  • Support hours: Monday–Friday, 9am–6pm (UTC)
  • Languages: English (primary)
  • Priority: Outages, accessibility, and security issues are handled first.

Legal & Privacy

Use the tool responsibly and in compliance with Facebook’s Terms and applicable laws.

Copyright

Only download content you own or have permission to use. Respect creators’ rights.

Data Protection

We don’t store your links or downloaded files. Messages sent here are used solely to provide support.

Security

If you believe you’ve found a security issue, describe the steps to reproduce it. Please do not share sensitive data.
